org.gello.runtime
Interface IGelloModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
SampleModel
public interface IGelloModel

IGelloModel is the interface that Gello Runtime and Compiler use to communicate with concrete models, such as the HL7 model. FUTURE: - How should the GELLO concept of "context" interact with the code generated by the compiler and the data model?

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getContextRoot()
          Returns the root object in the selected context of the model.
 java.lang.Class getContextRootClass()
          Returns the class of the root object in the selected context of the model.
 void loadData(java.io.InputStream stream)
          Loads the model with information from an input stream
 void loadDataDefault()
          Loads the model with default information
 CompileMessage[] parseData(java.io.InputStream stream)
          Parses an input stream for errors and returns a list of exceptions that occurred on compilation
 void saveData(java.io.OutputStream stream)
          Save the information in the model to an input stream
